text: Paul Jones (1901-1968), was an American film producer. His major work was done for Paramount Pictures. ==Career== He produced a number of the films of Preston Sturges, Bob Hope, Dean Martin, and Jerry Lewis. He also produced the Red Skelton comedy A Southern Yankee (1948) for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==External links== * Category:1901 births Category:1968 deaths Category:American film producers Category:20th-century American businesspeople
title: Paul Jones (film producer)
